welcome_message_body: Welcome to Irving, a charming city known for its vibrant arts scene and diverse cultural attractions. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious dining options, and unique shopping experiences. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our wonderful city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Love Field Airport is primarily used by Southwest Airlines and features a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
